mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manage_contractapprove (manage_contractapprove_id,manage_contractapprove_name,manage_contractapprove_company,manage_contractapprove_firstParty, manage_contractapprove_amount,manage_contractapprove_address,manage_contractapprove_startTime,manage_contractapprove_endTime,manage_contractapprove_attachAddress, manage_contractapprove_remark,manage_contractapprove_num,manage_status,manage_contractapprove_payment,manage_contractapprove_taxIncluded,manage_contractapprove_secondParty,category) VALUES (#{manage_contractapprove_id},#{manage_contractapprove_name},#{manage_contractapprove_company},#{manage_contractapprove_firstParty}, #{manage_contractapprove_amount},#{manage_contractapprove_address},#{manage_contractapprove_startTime},#{manage_contractapprove_endTime},#{manage_contractapprove_attachAddress}, #{manage_contractapprove_remark},#{manage_contractapprove_num},#{manage_status},#{manage_contractapprove_payment},#{manage_contractapprove_taxIncluded},#{manage_contractapprove_secondParty},#{category}) on duplicate key update manage_contractapprove_id=#{manage_contractapprove_id},manage_contractapprove_name=#{manage_contractapprove_name}, manage_contractapprove_company=#{manage_contractapprove_company},manage_contractapprove_firstParty=#{manage_contractapprove_firstParty}, manage_contractapprove_amount=#{manage_contractapprove_amount},manage_contractapprove_address=#{manage_contractapprove_address}, manage_contractapprove_startTime=#{manage_contractapprove_startTime},manage_contractapprove_endTime=#{manage_contractapprove_endTime}, manage_contractapprove_attachAddress=#{manage_contractapprove_attachAddress}, manage_contractapprove_remark=#{manage_contractapprove_remark},manage_contractapprove_num=#{manage_contractapprove_num}, manage_status=#{manage_status},manage_contractapprove_payment=#{manage_contractapprove_payment}, manage_contractapprove_taxIncluded=#{manage_contractapprove_taxIncluded},manage_contractapprove_secondParty=#{manage_contractapprove_secondParty} ,category=#{category}
